Package org.svvrl.goal.core.draw

Class TextTree

java.lang.Object
org.svvrl.goal.core.util.Tree<java.lang.String>
org.svvrl.goal.core.draw.TextTree
All Implemented Interfaces:
Drawer
public class TextTree
extends Tree<java.lang.String>
implements Drawer
This class provides an implementation of Tree. A text tree can be drawn on the screen.
Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

  • Method Details

    • layout

      public Pair<java.lang.Double,​java.lang.Double> layout​(java.awt.Graphics graphic, double x_padding, double y_padding, double min_x, double min_y)
      Lays out this tree.
      Parameters:
      graphic - a graphic context
      x_padding - the horizontal padding between two consecutive siblings
      y_padding - the vertical between a parent and its children
      min_x - the minimum x coordinate of the tree
      min_y - the minimum y coordinate of the tree
      Returns:
      a pair of the maximum x coordinate of the tree and the maximum y coordinate of the tree

    • move

      public void move​(double dx, double dy)
      Moves this tree.
      Parameters:
      dx - the horizontal distance of the movement
      dy - the vertical distance of the movement
